name: Agronomy KPIs
description: Track applications within optimal windows and re-treatment rates to measure agronomic effectiveness.

prd.problemStatement: Measuring agronomic success requires tracking application timing accuracy and treatment effectiveness. These KPIs demonstrate value to superintendents.
userStories: As a superintendent, I want to see application window compliance so that I can measure timing accuracy
As a superintendent, I want re-treatment rates so that I can evaluate product effectiveness
